entry.title: Online Appointment Booking System Reflected XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Online Appointment Booking System Reflected XSS Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-46181

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 在线预约预订系统(v1.0)中存在反射型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，特别是在处理预约确认的页面中。一个GET参数未能正确清理输入，使得可以在受害者的浏览器中注入并执行JavaScript代码。

产品名称： Online Appointment Booking System

影响版本： v1.0

来源： https://github.com/shemkumar/CVE-2025-46181-XSS

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • DISCLAIMER.md
  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • poc.py

来源概述

CVE-2025-46181 - Reflected XSS in an Online Appointment Booking System

CVE-ID: CVE-2025-46181
Discovered by: Shemkumar P (shemkumar.github.io)
Vulnerability Type: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
Severity: Medium
Status: Disclosed, CVE Assigned by MITRE

✨ Description

A Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in a public online appointment booking system (v1.0), specifically in the page that handles appointment confirmation. A GET parameter fails to sanitize input properly, enabling JavaScript injection and code execution in the victim’s browser.

📍 Vulnerable Parameter

Example Payload (Encoded):

💥 Proof of Concept (PoC)

🚫 Live link redacted for ethical reasons. This vulnerability was tested in a controlled environment.

⚙️ Python PoC Script

🛡️ Impact

  • Arbitrary JavaScript execution
  • Potential session hijacking
  • Clickjacking or phishing redirection
  • Targeted attacks through crafted links

🧪 Remediation

The application should:

  • Escape user inputs using htmlspecialchars() in PHP
  • Use a Content Security Policy (CSP)
  • Sanitize user data at both client and server sides

📜 Timeline

  • Discovered: May 2025
  • CVE Assigned by MITRE: June 2025
  • Public Release: June 2025

🧑‍💻 Author

Shemkumar P
🕸️ shemkumar.github.io
🔐 Cybersecurity Researcher | CTF Enthusiast | CVE Reporter

⚠️ This publication is for educational and defensive use only. Testing or exploiting vulnerabilities on systems you don’t own or have explicit permission for is illegal and unethical.

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Online Appointment Booking System Refle

entry.title: Microsoft Remote Desktop Services 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft Remote Desktop Services 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-0708

漏洞类型： 远程代码执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 远程桌面服务（以前称为终端服务）包含一个远程代码执行漏洞，由未经认证的攻击者通过RDP发送特制请求引起，允许远程攻击者执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要网络访问RDP端口。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Remote Desktop Services

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12278

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) contains a remote code execution caused by specially crafted requests sent over RDP by unauthenticated attackers, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to RDP port.

Severity: Critical
POC:

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.0R3/9.1R1及更高版本中的Windows文件共享浏览器和Pulse Secure协作功能存在认证绕过漏洞，允许未认证的攻击者执行远程任意代码，利用需要访问易受攻击的功能。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： 9.0R3/9.1R1 and higher

搜索语法： http.title:”ivanti connect secure”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12129

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Pulse Connect Secure 9.0R3/9.1R1 and higher contains an authentication bypass caused by vulnerabilities in Windows File Share Browser and Pulse Secure Collaboration features, letting unauthenticated attackers perform remote arbitrary code execution, exploit requires access to vulnerable features.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/orangmuda/CVE-2021-22893
  • https://github.com/MRLEE123456/CVE-2021-22893
  • https://github.com/ZephrFish/CVE-2021-22893_HoneyPoC2

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"ivanti connect secure"
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞

entry.title: Joplin 默认凭证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Joplin 默认凭证漏洞

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Joplin Server安装存在默认管理凭证漏洞。系统默认使用admin@localhost:admin作为管理员账户凭证。攻击者可以利用这些默认凭证获取Joplin Server实例的管理员访问权限，可能危及敏感用户数据和系统功能。

产品厂商： Joplin

产品名称： Joplin Server

搜索语法： title:”Joplin Server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/1471996485f9a40dac7dc8dea7a29601cc4420fa/http%2Fdefault-logins%2Fjoplin-default-login.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-0604

漏洞类型： 远程代码执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft SharePoint 存在一个远程代码执行漏洞，原因是未能检查应用程序包的源标记，允许远程攻击者通过发送恶意的应用程序包执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： SharePoint

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:sharepoint_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12340

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft SharePoint contains a remote code execution caused by failure to check the source markup of an application package, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending malicious application package.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/davidlebr1/cve-2019-0604-SP2010-netv3.5
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b321302986c1
  • https://github.com/Gh0st0ne/weaponized-0604
  • https///github.com:Gh0st0ne/weaponized-0604.git
  • https://github.com/boxhg/CVE-2019-0604
  • https://github.com/m5050/CVE-2019-0604
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/cca6def6980c
  • https://github.com/k8gege/CVE-2019-0604
  • https///github.com:k8gege/CVE-2019-0604.git
  • https://github.com/likekabin/CVE-2019-0604_sharepoint_CVE
  • https://github.com/linhlhq/CVE-2019-0604

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:sharepoint_server"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Chrome CVE-2025-5419 漏洞检查器
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Chrome CVE-2025-5419 漏洞检查器

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5419

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该工具用于检查Chrome浏览器是否受到CVE-2025-5419漏洞的影响。此漏洞允许恶意网站在用户机器上执行有害代码，及时更新Chrome可以保护用户安全。

产品厂商： Google

产品名称： Chrome

来源： https://github.com/itsShotgun/chrome_cve-2025-5419_checker

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • check.js
  • index.html
  • readme.md
  • style.css

来源概述

How to use

  • Open index.html in Chrome
  • The page will detect your Chrome version and tell you if you’re vulnerable.
  • If vulnerable, it’ll show a link to update Chrome immediately.

Why

  • This zero-day lets malicious websites run baaaaaaad code on your machine
  • Keeping Chrome updated protects you.
entry.summary:

entry.title: MCP Inspector proxy server lacks authentication between the Inspector client and proxy
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7f8r-222p-6f5g

仓库 Star： 3997

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/inspector/security/advisories/GHSA-7f8r-222p-6f5g

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49596

  • https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/inspector/commit/50df0e1ec488f3983740b4d28d2a968f12eb8979

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7f8r-222p-6f5g

描述：

Versions of MCP Inspector below 0.14.1 are vulnerable to remote code execution due to lack of authentication between the Inspector client and proxy, allowing unauthenticated requests to launch MCP commands over stdio. Users should immediately upgrade to version 0.14.1 or later to address these vulnerabilities.

Credit: Rémy Marot bughunters@tenable.com
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7f8r-222p-6f5g

entry.title: PAN-OS 反射型跨站脚本漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PAN-OS 反射型跨站脚本漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-0133

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS®软件中的GlobalProtect™网关和门户功能存在反射型跨站脚本（XSS）漏洞，当认证的Captive Portal用户点击特制链接时，可以在其浏览器上下文中执行恶意JavaScript。主要风险是可能导致凭证盗窃的钓鱼攻击，特别是如果启用了Clientless VPN。

产品厂商： Palo Alto Networks

产品名称： PAN-OS

搜索语法： http.favicon.hash:”-631559155”

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues
